message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $100, which I think is a fair deal considering its value. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but $100 seems a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for it. Can you consider my offer?
